review: Doctor explain everything very well, was fully satisfied with the doctor and her suggestions for improvement.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had undergone Invisalign treatment under Dr.Vidushi Seth Kedia at Avant Dental. I was amazed with the results.Invisalign treatment is an innovative way to straighten teeth. It is an effective, comfortable and convenient to use.Dr. Vidushi makes sure that her patients are comfortable.She explains the entire treatment clearly and has ears for all questions and doubts. Avant dental takes care of all the covid protocols and hygiene measures.
Thank you Dr. Vidushi for my new smile :). 
I would highly recommend everyone to visit Avant dental for any dental issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This was the best experience in regards to any doctor visit that I have had. Dr. Vidushi is so gentle that you will not even feel any slight pain or anything that she doing with those braces. I used to look forward to my appointments with her. So calm composed and ever smiling. And just brilliant in her work. Thanks to her that today i have a perfect smile. A sheer perfectionist.
reply_text: Thank you for such kind words Sneha …you have been a wonderful patient and it was a pleasure treating you !!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I came across this dental clinic looking for best dental clinics in Kolkata while searching in google. I had two problems one with impacted wisdom tooth and second  crooked teeth with open bite.
Getting an appointment with Dr. Vidushi was easy. The receptionist there is also very good. The clinic is neat and hygienic. It is equipped with all modern instruments. 
Dr. Vidushi is very friendly. She patiently listened to all my problems and gave proper consultation. 
Overall I am happy with the treatment and would recommend it to my friends and family members.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Grew impatient with my questions and trying to understand the process... Was told"most people just want straight teeth, they don't have so many questions about the procedure"

After this being my third appointment and I still didn't have clarity on the process or procedure it was about time I had a fuller picture. She didn't like all the questions. And left the room. Without saying goodbye or thank you or have a good day.

I wish her well in her practice. She is young and clearly has a lot to learn when it comes to customer service.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
He explained the procedure well. He answered all the queries patiently. 
The approach was professional and friendly.

review: Dr.Vidushi addressed all my queries with alot of patience the first time I visited her in February. After getting the braces put on, she attended to me for regular check ups and keeps the process painless.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Wonderful experience. I got my braces here and my smile looks beautiful. Nice clinic with excellent doctors. Highly recommended.

review: I had undergone braces treatment under Dr. Vidushi at Avant Dental. She listens to the patient's concern carefully and explains the entire procedure of treatment before executing it. Got excellent results post treatment. Would definitely recommend Avant Dental to anyone requiring dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Currently my kid (14 years) is under treatment for over bite. On first visit the diagnosing  the issues and process to overcome , more over the confidence of Dentist Dr. Vidush Seth  has given the relaxation to us like worried parents. Till now so far things are good and hoping to go in same way in whole treatment which is going to last 18 to 24 months. Also Doc is very flexible in adjusting the appoint to match with my school going kid classes.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
